summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to low-income housing; authorizing the application of policies in the Administrative and Financial Plan for the 1995 Housing Levy to low-income housing using other funds administered by the Department of Housing and Human Services; amending the 1995-96 Administrative and Financial Plan for the 1986 Housing Levy programs administered by such Department adopted in Ordinance 117937; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Health, Human Services, Education and Libraries
